name: XWUI Switch Component
description: Toggle switch component for boolean input. Supports various sizes, colors, label placement, and disabled states. Useful for on/off settings and boolean form inputs.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

labelPlacement.description: Placement of label relative to switch

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the switch

checkedContent.description: HTML string or text for checked state (e.g., 'I', 'ON', '<svg>...</svg>'). When set with showThumb=false, replaces the thumb with custom content.

uncheckedContent.description: HTML string or text for unchecked state (e.g., 'O', 'OFF', '<svg>...</svg>'). When set with showThumb=false, replaces the thumb with custom content.

showThumb.description: Whether to show the thumb or replace with custom content

checkedColor.description: Custom CSS color for checked state thumb/content (overrides color variant)

uncheckedColor.description: Custom CSS color for unchecked state thumb/content

checkedTrackColor.description: Custom CSS color for checked state track background

uncheckedTrackColor.description: Custom CSS color for unchecked state track background

mode.description: Switch mode: binary (on/off) or multi (multiple options)

options.description: Array of options for multi-state switch. Each option can have an icon, tooltip, and custom colors.

oneOf.description: Icon name (master icon name from CSV)

icon.description: Icon name or icon data object

tooltip.description: Tooltip text to show on hover

color.description: CSS color for this option when selected

trackColor.description: Track background color when this option is selected

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

checked.description: Whether the switch is checked (for binary mode)

label.description: Label text displayed next to the switch

name.description: HTML name attribute for form submission

id.description: HTML id attribute for the switch
